code-runner.executorMap.c: cd $dir && gcc $fileName -o test.exe && ./test.exe && echo  && echo ----done---- && rm ./test.exe
code-runner.executorMap.cpp: cd $dir && g++ $fileName -o test.exe && ./test.exe && echo  && echo ----done---- && rm ./test.exe

code-runner.executorMapByFileExtension.cs: clear && cd $dir && cd .. && cd jsresl_prose && msbuild && cat input.txt | mono ./bin/Debug/jsresl_prose.exe

code-runner.customCommand: clear && cd $dir && cd .. && cd jsresl_prose && cat input.txt | mono ./bin/Debug/jsresl_prose.exe
